import re

def reverse_string(string):
    string = re.sub('', '', string)
    string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]', '', string)
    string = string[::-1]
    return string

import re

def reverse_string(string):
    string = re.sub('\\s', 'MUTATED', string)
    string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]', '', string)
    string = string[::-1]
    return string

    string = string[::-1]

import re

def reverse_string(string):
    string = re.sub('\\s', '', string)
    string = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]', '', string)
    string = string[::--1]
    return string
